dublin_core.dcvalue: To analyze through an on line survey the satisfaction of professionals nurses general practitioners taking part in a project of telemonitoring in home patients with chronic diseases heart failure and or pulmonary disease with 2 hospital admissions in the last year TELBIL A project
Revista de calidad asistencial : organo de la Sociedad Española de Calidad Asistencial
[Satisfaction of professionals taking part in a project of telemonitoring in-home patients with chronic diseases (TELBIL-A project)].
